languages.text: "Приносим извинения за вынужденные неудобства, Вольный Торговец. Если вас это утешит, процесс погрузки практически завершен, остались формальности — в частности, нам нужна опись десятины. Она у клерка Терция Кварта. Хотя мне это и претит, вынуждена попросить вас, Вольный Торговец, привести его в расположение Адептус. Впрочем, отчета без клерка тоже будет достаточно".

"I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only a few formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."
languages.original_text: "Приносим извинения за вынужденные неудобства, Вольный Торговец. Если вас это утешит, процесс погрузки практически завершен, остались формальности — в частности, нам нужна опись десятины. Она у клерка Терция Кварта. Хотя мне это и претит, вынуждена попросить вас, Вольный Торговец, привести его в расположение Адептус. Впрочем, отчета без клерка тоже будет достаточно".

If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

"We need the tithe inventory to complete the procedure. Clerk Tertius Quartus has it. Though I dislike it, I must ask you to return him to the Adeptus' location, Rogue Trader, although the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

languages.text: «Lamento el inconveniente, Comerciante Independiente. Si le sirve de consuelo, el proceso de carga casi está listo, a falta de unas formalidades. Concretamente, lo que falta es el inventario del diezmo. Está en manos del funcionario Tertius Quart. Por mucho que me ofenda, debo pedirle que lo restituya al puesto avanzado. Por otra parte, recuperar el inventario sin el funcionario también bastará».
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only a few formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento el inconveniente, Comerciante Independiente. Si le sirve de consuelo, el proceso de carga casi está listo, a falta de unas formalidades. Concretamente, lo que falta es el inventario del diezmo. Está en manos del funcionario Tertius Quart. Por mucho que me ofenda, debo pedirle que lo restituya al puesto avanzado. Por otra parte, recuperar el inventario sin el funcionario también bastará».

languages.text: “给你造成不便，我深表歉意，行商浪人。不过好消息是，装载工作马上就完成了，只要再完成一部分手续就结束了。更具体地说，我们需要得到什一税的资源清单，它目前在特蒂乌斯·夸特职员手中。尽管这个请求很唐突，但我只能请求你将他带回哨站。当然，只要清单就够了，那个职员回不回来并不重要。”
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only a few formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

traits.locale_text: “给你造成不便，我深表歉意，行商浪人。不过好消息是，装载工作马上就完成了，只要再完成一部分手续就结束了。更具体地说，我们需要得到什一税的资源清单，它目前在特蒂乌斯·夸特职员手中。尽管这个请求很唐突，但我只能请求你将他带回哨站。当然，只要清单就够了，那个职员回不回来并不重要。”

languages.text: 「ご不便をおかけして申し訳ありません、ローグトレーダー。せめてもの慰めになるかもしれませんが、積み込み手続きはほぼ完了しています。残る作業は租税のインベントリを入手することだけです。事務員ターティウス・クアートがそれを持っています。言いたくはないですが、彼を前哨基地に戻していただかなくてはなりません。とはいえ、彼がいなくてもインベントリだけを回収していただいても構いません」
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, we are nearly done — one thing we still require in order to complete the loading procedure is the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

traits.locale_text: 「ご不便をおかけして申し訳ありません、ローグトレーダー。せめてもの慰めになるかもしれませんが、積み込み手続きはほぼ完了しています。残る作業は租税のインベントリを入手することだけです。事務員ターティウス・クアートがそれを持っています。言いたくはないですが、彼を前哨基地に戻していただかなくてはなりません。とはいえ、彼がいなくてもインベントリだけを回収していただいても構いません」

languages.text: « Je vous prie de m'excuser pour le dérangement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Si cela peut vous consoler, nous en avons pratiquement terminé. Il ne reste que quelques formalités, notamment l'inventaire de la dîme. Or, il est actuellement en possession du greffier Tertius. C'est bien malgré moi que je dois vous demander d'aller le chercher avant de le ramener à l'avant-poste. Cela étant dit, l'inventaire à lui seul nous suffit, rien ne vous oblige à vous encombrer du greffier. »
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only a few formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de m'excuser pour le dérangement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Si cela peut vous consoler, nous en avons pratiquement terminé. Il ne reste que quelques formalités, notamment l'inventaire de la dîme. Or, il est actuellement en possession du greffier Tertius. C'est bien malgré moi que je dois vous demander d'aller le chercher avant de le ramener à l'avant-poste. Cela étant dit, l'inventaire à lui seul nous suffit, rien ne vous oblige à vous encombrer du greffier. »

languages.text: "Bu rahatsızlıktan ötürü özür dilerim Hür Tacir. Belki teselli olur, işimiz bitmek üzere. Yalnız birkaç formalite kaldı. Özellikle aşar envanterine ihtiyacımız var. Envanter, Kâtip Tertius Quart'ta. Bu durum beni ne kadar rahatsız etse de sizden onu karakola getirmenizi istemek zorundayım Hür Tacir. Aslında kâtibin kendisi şart değil, envanter yeterli olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only a few formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."

traits.locale_text: "Bu rahatsızlıktan ötürü özür dilerim Hür Tacir. Belki teselli olur, işimiz bitmek üzere. Yalnız birkaç formalite kaldı. Özellikle aşar envanterine ihtiyacımız var. Envanter, Kâtip Tertius Quart'ta. Bu durum beni ne kadar rahatsız etse de sizden onu karakola getirmenizi istemek zorundayım Hür Tacir. Aslında kâtibin kendisi şart değil, envanter yeterli olacaktır."

languages.text: "Bitte verzeiht die Unannehmlichkeiten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Falls es Euch tröstet, der Verladeprozess ist nahezu abgeschlossen und es bleiben nur noch einige Formalitäten ... wir brauchen vor allem das Zehntinventar. Es ist im Besitz des Beamten Tertius Quart. Es widerstrebt mir zwar, aber ich muss Euch bitten, ihn zum Außenposten zurückzubringen. Wobei mir auch der Inventarbericht reichen würde."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for the inconvenience, Rogue Trader. If it's any consolation, the loading process is nearly complete, and only a few formalities remain — in particular, we need the tithe inventory. The clerk Tertius Quart has it. As much as it offends me, I must ask you to return him to the outpost. That said, retrieving the inventory without the clerk will also suffice."
